original: Majjhima Nikāya 69
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Goliyānisutta
analyzed: goliyānisutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena goliyāni nāma bhikkhu āraññiko padasamācāro saṅghamajjhe osaṭo hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena goliyāni nāma bhikkhu āraññikaḥ pada samācāraḥ saṅgha majjhe osaṭaḥ hoti kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto goliyāniṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ goliyānim bhikkhum ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena sabrahmacārīsu sagāravena bhavitabbaṁ sappatissena.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena sabrahmacārīsu sa gāravena bhavitabbam sa patissena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto sabrahmacārīsu agāravo hoti appatisso, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ sabrahmacārīsu agāravaḥ hoti appatissaḥ tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena, yo ayamāyasmā sabrahmacārīsu agāravo hoti appatisso’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā sabrahmacārīsu agāravaḥ hoti appatissaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena sabrahmacārīsu sagāravena bhavitabbaṁ sappatissena.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena sabrahmacārīsu sa gāravena bhavitabbam sa patissena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṁ:
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena āsana kusalena bhavitabba

original: ‘iti there ca bhikkhū nānupakhajja nisīdissāmi nave ca bhikkhū na āsanena paṭibāhissāmī’ti.
analyzed: iti there ca bhikkhū na an upakhajja nisīdissāmi nave ca bhikkhū na āsanena paṭibāhissāmi iti

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto na āsanakusalo hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ na āsana kusalaḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena, yo ayamāyasmā āsanakusalo na hotī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmai āsana kusalaḥ na hoti iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena āsanakusalena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena āsana kusalena bhavitabba

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena ābhisamācārikopi dhammo jānitabbo.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena ābhisamācārikaḥ api dhammaḥ jānitabbo

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto ābhisamācārikampi dhammaṁ na jānāti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ ābhisamācārikam pi dhammam na jānāti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā ābhisamācārikampi dhammaṁ na jānātī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmai ābhisamācārikam pi dhammam na jānāti iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena ābhisamācārikopi dhammo jānitabbo.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena ābhisamācārikaḥ api dhammaḥ jānitabbaḥ

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena nātikālena gāmo pavisitabbo nātidivā paṭikkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena na atikālena gāmaḥ pavisitabbaḥ na atidivā paṭikkamitabba

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati atidivā paṭikkamati, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ atikālena gāmam pavisati atidivā paṭikkamati tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati atidivā paṭikkamatī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā ati kālena gāmam pavisati atidivā paṭikkamati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena nātikālena gāmo pavisitabbo, nātidivā paṭikkamitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena na ati kālena gāmaḥ pavisitabbaḥ na ati divā paṭikkamitabba

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena na purebhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena na purebhattam pacchābhattam kulesu cārittam āpajjitabba

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto purebhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjati, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ purebhattam pacchābhattam kulesu cārittam āpajjati tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Ayaṁ nūnimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena viharato vikālacariyā bahulīkatā, tamenaṁ saṅghagatampi samudācaratī’ti—
analyzed: ayam nūnimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe serivihārena viharataḥ vikāla cariyā bahulīkatā tam enam saṅgha gatam pi samudācarati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena na purebhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena na purebhattam pacchābhattam kulesu cārittam

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabbaṁ acapalena.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena an uddhatena bhavitabbam a capalena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto uddhato hoti capalo, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ uddhataḥ hoti capalaḥ tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Idaṁ nūnimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena viharato uddhaccaṁ cāpalyaṁ bahulīkataṁ, tamenaṁ saṅghagatampi samudācaratī’ti—
analyzed: idam nūnam assa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe sa iri vihārena viharataḥ uddhaccam cāpalyam tam enam saṅgha gatam pi samudācarati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabbaṁ acapalena.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena an uddhatena bhavitabbam a capalena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabbaṁ avikiṇṇavācena.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena a mukharena bhavitabbam a vikiṇṇa vācena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto mukharo hoti vikiṇṇavāco, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ mukharaḥ hoti vikiṇṇa vācaḥ tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā mukharo vikiṇṇavāco’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā mukharaḥ vikiṇṇa vācaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabbaṁ avikiṇṇavācena.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena a mukharena bhavitabbam a vikiṇṇa vācena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbaṁ kalyāṇamittena.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbam kalyāṇa mittena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu saṅghagato saṅghe viharanto dubbaco hoti pāpamitto, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu saṅgha gataḥ saṅghe viharantaḥ dubbacaḥ hoti pāpa mitto tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā dubbaco pāpamitto’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe sa iri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā dubbacaḥ pāpa mittaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅghagatena saṅghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbaṁ kalyāṇamittena.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā saṅgha gatena saṅghe viharantena suvacena bhavitabbam kalyāṇa mittena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā indriyesu guttadvārena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā indriyesu gutta dvārena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvāro hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu indriyesu a gutta dvāraḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā indriyesu aguttadvāro’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā indriyesu a gutta dvārā ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā indriyesu guttadvārena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā indriyesu gutta dvārena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā bhojane mattaññunā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā bhojane mattaññunā

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu bhojane amattaññū hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu bhojane a mattaññū hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā bhojane amattaññū’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā bhojane amattaññu iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā bhojane mattaññunā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā bhojane mattaññunā

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā jāgariyaṁ anuyuttena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā jāgariyam anuyuttena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu jāgariyaṁ ananuyutto hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu jāgariyam an anuyuttaḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā jāgariyaṁ ananuyutto’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā jāgariyam an anuyuttaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā jāgariyaṁ anuyuttena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā jāgariyam anuyuttena bhavitabba

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā āraddha vīriyena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu kusīto hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu kusītaḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā kusīto’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā kusītaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā āraddha vīriyena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā upaṭṭhitassatinā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā upaṭṭhita ssatinā

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu muṭṭhassatī hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu muṭṭha ssatī hoti tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā muṭṭhassatī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā muṭṭhassati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā upaṭṭhitassatinā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā upaṭṭhita ssatinā

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā samāhitena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā samāhitena

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu asamāhito hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu asamāhitaḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā asamāhito’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā asamāhitaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā samāhitena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā samāhitena

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā paññavatā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā paññavatā

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu duppañño hoti, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu duppaññaḥ hoti tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā duppañño’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa araññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā duppaññaḥ ti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā paññavatā bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā paññavatā

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā abhidhamme abhivinaye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: Santāvuso, āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ abhidhamme abhivinaye pañhaṁ pucchitāro.
analyzed: santi āvuso āraññikam bhikkhum abhidhamme abhivinaye pañham pucchitāraḥ

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu abhidhamme abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho na sampāyati, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu abhidhamme abhivinaye pañham puṭṭhaḥ na sampāyati tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā abhidhamme abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho na sampāyatī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmai abhidhamme abhivinaye pañham puṭṭhaḥ na sampāyati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā abhidhamme abhivinaye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha yogo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha yogaḥ karaṇīyo

original: Santāvuso, āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañhaṁ pucchitāro.
analyzed: santi āvuso āraññikam bhikkhum ye te santā vimokkhāḥ atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañham pucchitāro

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañhaṁ puṭṭho na sampāyati, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu ye te santā vimokkhāḥ atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañham puṭṭhaḥ na sampāyati tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañhaṁ puṭṭho na sampāyatī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha pañham puṭṭhaḥ na sampāyati iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha yogo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā tattha yogaḥ karaṇīyo

original: Āraññikenāvuso, bhikkhunā uttari manussadhamme yogo karaṇīyo.
analyzed: āraññikena āvuso bhikkhunā uttari manussa dhamme yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: Santāvuso, āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ uttari manussadhamme pañhaṁ pucchitāro.
analyzed: santi āvuso āraññikam bhikkhum uttari manussa dhamme pañham pucchitāraḥ

original: Sace, āvuso, āraññiko bhikkhu uttari manussadhamme pañhaṁ puṭṭho na sampāyati, tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: sace āvuso āraññikaḥ bhikkhu uttari manussa dhamme pañham puṭṭhaḥ na sampāyati tassa bhavanti vattāro

original: ‘Kiṁ panimassāyasmato āraññikassa ekassāraññe serivihārena yo ayamāyasmā yassatthāya pabbajito tamatthaṁ na jānātī’ti—
analyzed: kim panimassa āyasmataḥ āraññikassa ekassa āraññe seri vihārena yaḥ ayam āyasmā yad atthāya pabbajitaḥ tam attham na jānāti iti

original: tassa bhavanti vattāro.
analyzed: tassa bhavanti vattāraḥ

original: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā uttari manussadhamme yogo karaṇīyo”ti.
analyzed: tasmai āraññikena bhikkhunā uttari manussa dhamme yogo karaṇīyaḥ ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: “āraññikeneva nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā ime dhammā samādāya vattitabbā udāhu gāmantavihārināpī”ti?
analyzed: āraññikena iva nu kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā ime dhammā samādāya vattitabbā udāhu gāmantavihārinā api iti

original: “Āraññikenāpi kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā ime dhammā samādāya vattitabbā pageva gāmantavihārinā”ti.
analyzed: āraññikena api kho āvuso moggallāna bhikkhunā ime dhammā samādāya vattitabbā pagā iva gāmanta vihārinā ati

original: Goliyānisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: goliyāni suttam niṭṭhitam navama
